content.raw:
Ah... Sorry, but now I found a series of weird behaviours... In the same situation as above (parent already chosen, choosing child):

A. Press the wheel button on the ground and drag it upwards until the mouse is over the sky, the orbiting stops. 

B. It's also not possible to orbit from below the ground, so if you end up under the ground you're stuck there.

C. Dragging on top of the the parent part does work, but the yellow indicator shows up on the last position it was, instead of the current target.
